viStories.title: Đi ra ngoài
viStories.focusWords: tôi, đi, ra ngoài, trời, nắng, về

viStories.title: Chơi bóng
viStories.focusWords: tôi, bạn, có, bóng, ném, bắt

tlStories.title: Nagugutom (Hungry)

sentences.tl: Binigyan ako ng kaibigan ko ng kanin.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, kumain, wala, gutom. New words in context: kanin (rice), kaibigan (friend).

tlStories.title: Pumunta sa Paaralan (Going to School)

sentences.tl: Naglaro kami ng mga kaibigan pagkatapos ng klase.
sentences.en: I play with friends after class.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, aral, libro, kaibigan. New words in context: klase (class), laro (play).

tlStories.title: Naglaro ng Bola (Playing Ball)

sentences.tl: Hinagis ng kaibigan ko ang bola sa akin.
sentences.en: My friend throws the ball to me.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, laro, kaibigan, bola. New words in context: labas (outside), masaya (fun).

tlStories.title: Pumunta sa Palengke (Shopping)

sentences.tl: Bumili ako ng gulay at prutas.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, bumili, palengke, bayad. New words in context: gulay (vegetables), prutas (fruits).

tlStories.title: Nasa Bahay (At Home)

sentences.tl: Kumakain ang pamilya ko ng hapunan kasama-sama.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, bahay, basa, kain. New words in context: magluto (cook), pamilya (family).

tlStories.title: Naglakad-lakad (Going for a Walk)

sentences.en: I go for a walk in the park.

sentences.tl: Nakita ko ang isang lumang kaibigan.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, lakad, kaibigan, nakita. New words in context: parke (park), bulaklak (flower).

tlStories.title: Panahon (Weather)
tlStories.focusWords: ngayon, mainit, dala, ulan. New words in context: araw (sunny), payong (umbrella).

tlStories.title: Sakay sa Bus (Taking the Bus)

sentences.tl: Sumasakay ako sa bus papunta sa paaralan.
sentences.en: I take the bus to school.
I get off at the last stop.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, bus, bumili, bumaba. New words in context: hintuan (stop), tiket (ticket).

tlStories.title: Matulog (Going to Sleep)
tlStories.focusWords: ako, tulog, ligo, suot. New words in context: mag-toothbrush (brush teeth), pajamas (pajamas).

tlStories.title: Naglaro sa Alagang Hayop (Playing with Pets)
tlStories.focusWords: ako, pusa, pakain, laro. New words in context: alagang hayop (pet), gusto (love).

tlStories.title: Mag-book ng Hotel (Booking a Hotel Room)

sentences.en: I want to book a room.
How many beds are in the room?

sentences.tl: Nagbayad ako at kinuha ang susi.
sentences.en: I pay and get the key.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, kwarto, book, bayad. New words in context: hotel (hotel), kama (bed).

tlStories.title: Sumakay ng Taxi (Taking a Taxi)
tlStories.focusWords: ako, taxi, sumakay, bayad. New words in context: address (address), pagdating (arrive).

tlStories.title: Bumili ng Souvenir (Buying Souvenirs)

sentences.tl: Dinala ko ang regalo sa bahay.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, bumili, pili, dala. New words in context: regalo (gift), bilang (count/pay).

tlStories.title: Kumain sa Labas (Eating Out)

sentences.tl: Uminom ako at umorder ng pagkain.
Kumain ako ng kanin kasama ang kaibigan.
sentences.en: I ate rice with a friend.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, order, kain. New words in context: restaurant (restaurant), pagkain (dish).

tlStories.title: Bumili ng Ticket sa Sinehan (Buying Movie Tickets)

sentences.en: I want to watch a movie.

sentences.tl: Bumili ako ng ticket sa counter.
sentences.en: I buy tickets at the counter.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, bumili, pili, manood. New words in context: sine (movie), counter (counter).

tlStories.title: Pumunta sa Beach (Going to the Beach)

sentences.en: I go home when it gets dark.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, laro, umuwi. New words in context: beach (beach), dagat (sea).

tlStories.title: Bumisita sa Museo (Visiting a Museum)

sentences.tl: Tumingin ako ng mga painting at artifacts.
sentences.en: I look at paintings and artifacts.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, tingin, learn. New words in context: museo (museum), artifacts (artifact).

tlStories.title: Nagtanong ng Direksyon (Asking for Directions)

sentences.en: They tell me to go straight.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, tanong, daan, dumating. New words in context: tao (passerby), diretso (straight).

tlStories.title: Pumunta sa Night Market (Visiting Night Market)

sentences.en: I go to the night market.

sentences.tl: Tiningnan ko ang pagkain at souvenirs.
sentences.en: I look at food and souvenirs.

sentences.tl: Bumili ako ng ilang maliit na bagay.
sentences.en: I buy a few small items.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, tingin, subok. New words in context: night market (night market), pagkain (dish).

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, sumakay, lumipad. New words: paliparan (airport), check-in (check-in).

sentences.en: I go to the post office.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, magpadala, makatanggap. New words: post office (post office), package (package).

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, withdraw, deposit. New words: bangko (bank), resibo (receipt).

sentences.en: I go to a coffee shop.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, pumunta, umorder, uminom. New words: kapehan (coffee shop), kape (coffee).

tlStories.title: Kumain ng agahan (Eating Breakfast)

sentences.en: I am hungry in the morning.

sentences.tl: Kumain ako ng toast na may itlog.

sentences.en: I drink a glass of milk.

tlStories.focusWords: ako, kumain, agahan, busog. New words in context: toast (bread), itlog (egg), gatas (milk).
